page.title: 11Facilities in Staining Cl. 6
page.content: Playschool four mornings a week. Clinic for babies and toddlers twice weekly. Pre-school group twice weekly. Mother and toddler meetings weekly. Primary school in Village. Adult education class in Church in winter. Flower arranging, dressmaking, art and craft, Yoga and Popmobility. Women's Institute monthly. Scouts and Brownies weekly. Youth Club weekly. Gala, Church Garden Party and May Queen yearly. Disco monthly. Dolphin Swimming Club, for children who attend Primary School once weekly during term time. In l970 the Staining Development Association was formed to raise funds to build a Sports and Community Centre. By l985, 3000000p had been raised but there are problems with regard to the availability of land. It is hoped that this project will eventually come to fruition.
